description:
Pop quizzes are supposed to be surprising, but can class 4-1 handle the surprises Pascal has in store for them? Meanwhile, a weary traveler finds the strength to continue in an unlikely place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beware of Pop Quizzes! / Perfect Plate
Nukiuchi Test ni Ki o Tsukero! / Perfect Plate
ぬきうちテストに気をつけろ! / 完璧[パーフェクト]プレート
